resources.string: Hi! My name is Allison and you may recognize me if you\'ve been to our store. I\'m the proud owner of the Mad Batter Bakery, which has been open for 5 years! I was 26 when I started this bakery and have always loved baking since I was a child. It\'s been a pleasure to share my passion and excitement with the community. So thank you, for letting me sharing my love with y\'all!
How long will it take for you to complete my order?
It takes between 24 to 72 hours for an order to be completed. Once completed, you\'ll be notified via email
If I order a cake, can I get writing on it?
You sure can! Just let me know in the email upon checkout
Can I place an order over the phone?
Due to accountability, we do not take orders over the phone. Please order via the app or our website!
